p: The structure of three major compounds isolated from C. digyna namely Isointricatinol, Isobonducellin, and Z-eucomine were drawn by ChemDraw. The ligands structures were plotted three-dimensionally (3D) by utilizing the LigPrep in Maestro version 11.1 (Schrödinger suite, LLC New York, NY, USA) with the force field OPLS_2005 and pH 7.0 ± 2.0 for ionization state generation that used Epik 2.2 [ 34].
